package.description:
SOEM is an open source EtherCAT master library written in c. Its primary target is Linux but can be adapted to other OS and embedded systems. (http://developer.berlios.de/projects/soem/)
This package contains the original soem c code provided by the Technische Universiteit Eindhoven.
package.author: Arthur Ketels and M.J.G. van den Molengraft; packaged by Ruben Smits
